fileheader.author: Aeromatic v 3.3.15
Salvatore De Astis
fileheader.description: Models a ProMecc-Freccia. * Datcom+ stability deriatives integrated. * Tuning of : Metrics, Mass Balance, Point Masses, Ground Reaction, Flight Comtrols

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-lift
function.description: Change in lift due to ground effect factor

function.name: aero/function/ground-effect-factor-drag
function.description: Change in drag due to ground effect

function.name: aero/function/ailerons-pos-sum-deg
function.description: Add the two aileron, required for Roll axis

function.name: aero/force/Lift_propwash
function.description: Delta lift due to propeller induced velocity

function.name: aero/force/Lift_alpha_CLwbh
function.description: Lift due to alpha

function.name: aero/force/Lift_pitch_rate_CLq
function.description: Lift due to pitch rate

function.name: aero/force/Lift_alpha_rate_CLad
function.description: Lift due to alpha rate

function.name: aero/force/Lift_elevator_CLDe
function.description: Lift due to Elevator Deflection

function.name: aero/force/Lift_Flap_CLdF2L
function.description: Lift Coefficient due to Left Single Slotted Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this left flap pos

function.name: aero/force/Lift_Flap_CLdF2R
function.description: Lift Coefficient due to Right Single Slotted Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this right flap pos

function.name: aero/force/Lift_Ail_CLdaL
function.description: Lift Coefficient due to Left Single Slotted Aileron Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this left flap pos

function.name: aero/force/Lift_Ail_CLdaR
function.description: Lift Coefficient due to Right Single Slotted Aileron Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this right flap pos

function.name: aero/force/Drag_Basic_CD
function.description: Basic Drag Coefficient Sense: Always positive Main contributor to Phugoid damping: Greater Cd, Better damping

function.name: aero/force/Drag_beta
function.description: Drag due to sideslip

function.name: aero/force/Drag_elevator_CdDe
function.description: Drag Coefficient due to Elevator Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down

function.name: aero/force/Drag_Ail_CdDaL
function.description: Drag Coefficient due to Left Single Slotted Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this left flap pos

function.name: aero/force/Drag_Ail_CdDaR
function.description: Drag Coefficient due to Right Single Slotted Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this right flap pos

function.name: aero/force/Drag_gear
function.description: Drag due to gear

function.name: aero/force/Drag_Flap_CdDf2L
function.description: Drag Coefficient due to Left Single Slotted Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this left flap pos

function.name: aero/force/Drag_Flap_CdDf2R
function.description: Drag Coefficient due to Right Single Slotted Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this right flap pos

function.name: aero/force/Side_beta_Cyb
function.description: Side Force coefficient due to Sideslip(per degree) Contributes to damping of Dutch Roll mode

function.name: aero/force/Side_roll_rate_Cyp
function.description: Side Force Coefficient due to Roll Rate(per degree)

function.name: aero/force/Side_yaw_rate_Cyr
function.description: Side Force due to Yaw Rate(DATCOM does not calculate) Effect is small

function.name: aero/force/Side_rudder_CyDr
function.description: Side Force due to rudder(DATCOM does not calculate)

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_propwash
function.description: Pitch moment due to propeller induced velocity

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_alpha
function.description: Pitch moment due to alpha

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_elevator
function.description: Pitch moment due to elevator

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_damp
function.description: Pitch moment due to pitch rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_alphadot
function.description: Pitch moment due to alpha rate

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_CmDf2L
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to left Single Slotted Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this left flap pos

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_CmDf2R
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to right Single Slotted Flaps Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this right flap pos

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_Ail_CmDaL
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to left Single Slotted Aileron Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this left flap pos

function.name: aero/moment/Pitch_Ail_CmDaR
function.description: Pitch moment coefficient due to right Single Slotted Aileron Deflection Positive surface deflection is trailing edge down Ultimately, we will feed this right flap pos

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_differential_propwash
function.description: Roll moment due to differential propwash

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_beta_Clb
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to Beta(per degree) Decrease of Clb to small negative value improves Dutch Roll Damping High Positive value leads to excessive spiral instability

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_damp_Clp
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to roll rate(per degree) Clp alone determines damping-in-roll characteristics

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_yaw_Clr
function.description: Roll Moment coefficient due to yaw rate(per degree) Considerable effect on Spiral mode. Large positive values leads to strong sprial instability.

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_aileron_ClDa
function.description: Roll Moment Coefficient due to Asymetrical Single Slotted Flaps Deflection calculated as difference between left and right flap lift coef, times distance from centerline to MAC of surface.

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_AsymFlpDeflec_CldF2
function.description: Roll Moment Coefficient due to Asymetrical Single Slotted Flaps Deflection calculated as difference between left and right flap lift coef, times distance from centerline to MAC of surface.

function.name: aero/moment/Roll_rudder
function.description: Roll moment due to rudder

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_alpha
function.description: Yaw moment due to alpha

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_beta_Cnb
function.description: Yaw moment coefficient due to sideslip(per degree) Determines Dutch Roll and Spiral characteristics Prevents side-slip and yawing moments

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_roll_rate_Cnp
function.description: Yaw moment coefficient due to roll rate(per degree) Reduces Dutch Roll damping positive value desireable

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_damp_Cnr
function.description: Yaw Moment coefficient due to yaw rate(per degree) Main contributor to damping of Dutch Roll

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_rudder_CnDr
function.description: Yaw moment due to rudder

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_aileron_CnDa
function.description: Yaw Moment Coefficient due to Asymetrical Single Slotted Flaps Deflection calculated as difference between left and right flap drag coef, times distance from centerline to MAC of surface.

function.name: aero/moment/Yaw_AymFlpDeflec_CnDf2
function.description: Yaw Moment Coefficient due to Asymetrical Single Slotted Flaps Deflection calculated as difference between left and right flap drag coef, times distance from centerline to MAC of surface.
